original_text: if you then have acted in good faith and integrity with Jerubbaal and with his house this day, then rejoice in Abimelech, and let him also rejoice in you.
korean_text: 만일 너희가 오늘 여룹바알과 그의 집을 대접한 것이 진실하고 의로운 일이면 너희가 아비멜렉으로 말미암아 기뻐할 것이요 아비멜렉도 너희로 말미암아 기뻐하려니와

sentences.original_text: if you then have acted in good faith and integrity
with Jerubbaal and with his house this day
and let him also rejoice in you
